attributes.comment:
Dear Sir Or Madam:
Incrasing fees will just put more burden on the immigrant or thier employer in
essense that it will also disourage foreign workers to be employed in USA. As it
is , immigrants have been hammered by the routine system of renewal of H1,
filing fees, adjustment fees and on top of that the lawyer fees. Not to mention
that even local state governments have also been changing their fee schedule for
non immigrant visa holders like for example, the DMV will issue a license valid
for only 1 year for a H1B - 7 th year holder and charge the full fee for a
renewal. This is UNFAIR.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By H.H.Shah
